function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven UVGI distribution in the upper room due to fixture installation and lamp failure.","Impact":"Reduced efficacy in killing or inactivating airborne droplet nuclei containing Mycobacterium spp.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of UVGI fixtures' efficacy and uniform distribution of UVGI.","Technologies":"Upper-room UVGI systems with standardized fixtures and lamp monitoring technology.","People":"Occupants in the built environment at risk of exposure to Mycobacterium spp.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Inability of HVAC system to efficiently kill microbes transmitted by droplets.","Impact":"Insufficient disinfection of airborne droplets containing infectious agents such as SARS-CoV and influenza.","Mitigation":"Implementation of alternate methods of disinfection for particles that do not reach the upper-room UV zone.","Technologies":"Alternate disinfection methods for airborne droplets, such as filtration systems or chemical treatment.","People":"Occupants in the built environment at risk of exposure to infectious agents transmitted by droplets.","Owner":"Building management and maintenance staff."}]}
